docs.lead_paragraph: A Florida law barring doctors from routinely asking patients if they own a gun creates a new set of problems, a primary care doctor writes.

headline.seo: Routine Gun Inquiry Is Off Limits for Doctors in Florida
headline.main: Gun Query Off Limits for Doctors in Florida
headline.print_headline: Gun Query Off Limits For Doctors In Florida
